channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Olivia Rodrigo Brings Out David Byrne for Scorching ‘Burning Down the House’ (And Does Some of His Dance Moves) at Gov Ball
item.description: 🔥 Olivia Rodrigo and David Byrne set Gov Ball on fire with 'Burning Down the House' collab! 💃🎶 #GovBall2022 #OliviaRodrigo #DavidByrne

item.title: Wayne Lewis, Founding Member of Atlantic Starr, Dead at 68
item.description: 🎶 Remembering a legend 🌟 Wayne Lewis, co-founder of Atlantic Starr, leaves behind a legacy of timeless hits. Rest in power 💔 #RIPWayneLewis

item.title: Paul McCartney Joins Bruce Springsteen in Liverpool for “Can’t Buy Me Love”: Watch
item.description: 🎸🎶 Legends unite! Paul McCartney surprises fans at Bruce Springsteen's Liverpool show for an epic rendition of "Can't Buy Me Love"! #MusicLegends #RockRoyalty

item.title: Wu‐Tang Clan Kick Off Final Tour in Baltimore: Videos + Setlist
item.description: Wu-Tang Clan bringing 🔥 to Baltimore on their final tour! Check out the epic setlist and killer videos 🎤🎶 #WuTangForever

item.title: Belinda Carlisle Announces First English-Language Album In Nearly 30 Years, Once Upon A Time In California
item.description: 🌟 The pop legend is back with new beats! 🎶 Belinda Carlisle drops her first English album in 3 decades! 🎤 #BelindaCarlisle #NewMusicAlert
